mapper.select: SELECT /* SMBMnVslMapper.selectMnVslList */ SEQ, TITL, DATE_FORMAT(STRT_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS STRT_DTM, DATE_FORMAT(END_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS END_DTM, ODTM_YN, MAIN_YN, REG_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NM, REG_DTM, MOD_ID, MOD_DTM, ORD, DVC_CD, CATEGORY, (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NM FROM SM_MAIN_VSL_MST A WHERE 1=1 AND DVC_CD = #{gubun} AND LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND REG_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{dStrDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND MOD_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{dStrDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{dEndDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND MOD_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{dEndDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND STRT_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND END_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND ( MAIN_YN = #{mainYn} ) AND ( CATEGORY = #{category} ) AND TITL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') AND CONCAT((SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID), '(', REG_ID,')') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') AND CONCAT((SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID), '(', MOD_ID,')') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') AND YEAR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') AND ( (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR TITL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR CNTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') ) ORDER BY ORD DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM SM_MAIN_VSL_MST WHERE DVC_CD = #{gubun} AND LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND REG_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{dStrDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND MOD_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{dStrDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{dEndDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND MOD_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{dEndDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND STRT_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND END_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND ( MAIN_YN = #{mainYn} ) AND ( CATEGORY = #{category} ) AND TITL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') AND CONCAT((SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID), '(', REG_ID,')') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') AND CONCAT((SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID), '(', MOD_ID,')') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') AND YEAR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') AND ( (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR TITL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR CNTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') )

SELECT /* SMBMnVslMapper.selectMnVslDtl */ SEQ , TITL , STRT_DTM , END_DTM , ODTM_YN , PC_ATCH_FILE_SEQ , MBL_ATCH_FILE_SEQ , MN_COPY , MN_HEX_CD , SUB_COPY , SUB_HEX_CD , LINK_URL , NEW_WNDW_YN , MAIN_YN , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NM , MOD_DTM , CATEGORY FROM SM_MAIN_VSL_MST A WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{detailsKey} AND DVC_CD = #{gubun}
mapper.insert: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ORD), 0) + 1 FROM SM_MAIN_VSL_MST WHERE DVC_CD = #{dvcCd} and LANG_CD = #{langCd} INSERT /* SMBMnVslMapper.insertMnVsl */ INTO SM_MAIN_VSL_MST ( SEQ , LANG_CD , DVC_CD , TITL , STRT_DTM , END_DTM , ODTM_YN , PC_ATCH_FILE_SEQ , MBL_ATCH_FILE_SEQ , MN_COPY , MN_HEX_CD , SUB_COPY , SUB_HEX_CD , LINK_URL , NEW_WNDW_YN , ORD , MAIN_YN , REG_ID , REG_IP , REG_DTM , CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{seq} , #{langCd} , #{gubun} , #{titl} , NULL , NULL , #{strtDtm} , #{endDtm} , #{odtmYn} , #{pcAtchFileSeq} , NULL , NULL , #{mblAtchFileSeq} , #{mnCopy} , #{mnHexCd} , #{subCopy} , #{subHexCd} , #{linkUrl} , #{newWndwYn} , #{ord} , #{mainYn} , #{regId} , #{regIp} , NOW() , #{category} )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* SMBMnVslMapper.updateMnVsl */ SM_MAIN_VSL_MST SET TITL = #{titl} , STRT_DTM = NULL , END_DTM = NULL , STRT_DTM = #{strtDtm} , END_DTM = #{endDtm} , ODTM_YN = #{odtmYn} , PC_ATCH_FILE_SEQ = #{pcAtchFileSeq} , MBL_ATCH_FILE_SEQ = NULL , PC_ATCH_FILE_SEQ = NULL , MBL_ATCH_FILE_SEQ = #{mblAtchFileSeq} , MN_COPY = #{mnCopy} , MN_HEX_CD = #{mnHexCd} , SUB_COPY = #{subCopy} , SUB_HEX_CD = #{subHexCd} , LINK_URL = #{linkUrl} , NEW_WNDW_YN = #{newWndwYn} , MAIN_YN = #{mainYn} , MOD_ID = #{regId} , MOD_IP = #{regIp} , MOD_DTM = NOW() , CATEGORY = #{category} WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{detailsKey} AND DVC_CD = #{gubun}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* SMBMnVslMapper.deleteMnVsl */ FROM SM_MAIN_VSL_MST SEQ IN #{delValueList} SEQ = #{detailsKey} AND DVC_CD = #{gubun}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* SMBMnVslMapper.updateOrder */ SM_MAIN_VSL_MST SET ORD = #{ord} , MOD_ID = #{modId} , MOD_IP = #{modIp} , MOD_DTM = NOW() WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{seq} AND DVC_CD = #{gubun}
mapper.select: SELECT /* SMBMnVslMapper.selectMnNewRow */ SEQ, ORD, DVC_CD FROM SM_MAIN_VSL_MST WHERE ORD = ( SELECT MIN(ORD) MAX(ORD) FROM SM_MAIN_VSL_MST WHERE 1=1 AND ORD > #{ord} AND ORD < #{ord} AND DVC_CD = #{gubun} ) AND DVC_CD = #{gubun} LIMIT 1
SELECT /* SMBMnVslMapper.selectMnVslCnt */ COUNT(SEQ) FROM SM_MAIN_VSL_MST WHERE 1=1 AND LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND DVC_CD = #{gubun} AND MAIN_YN = 'Y' AND SEQ <> #{detailsKey}

SELECT /* SMBMnVslMapper.selectNowMnVsl */ (CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = A.PC_ATCH_FILE_SEQ AND instr(#{imageExtns}, FILE_EXTN) > 0 ) THEN 'image' WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = A.PC_ATCH_FILE_SEQ AND instr(#{videoExtns}, FILE_EXTN) > 0 )THEN 'video' ELSE NULL END) AS BEFORE_GB (CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = A.MBL_ATCH_FILE_SEQ AND instr(#{imageExtns}, FILE_EXTN) > 0 ) THEN 'image' WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = A.MBL_ATCH_FILE_SEQ AND instr(#{videoExtns}, FILE_EXTN) > 0 ) THEN 'video' ELSE NULL END) AS BEFORE_GB , (CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{pcAtchFileSeq} AND instr(#{imageExtns}, FILE_EXTN) > 0 ) THEN 'image' WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{pcAtchFileSeq} AND instr(#{videoExtns}, FILE_EXTN) > 0 ) THEN 'video' ELSE NULL END) AS NOW_GB , (CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{mblAtchFileSeq} AND instr(#{imageExtns}, FILE_EXTN) > 0 ) THEN 'image' WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{mblAtchFileSeq} AND instr(#{videoExtns}, FILE_EXTN) > 0 ) THEN 'video' ELSE NULL END) AS NOW_GB FROM SM_MAIN_VSL_MST A WHERE 1=1 AND LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND DVC_CD = #{gubun} AND MAIN_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MOD_DTM DESC LIMIT 1
